2081570.name: The Ascent - Cyber Heist - Soundtrack
2081570.description:
The Ascent is a solo and co-op Action-shooter RPG set in a cyberpunk world. The mega corporation that owns you and everyone, The Ascent Group, has just collapsed. Can you survive without it?

Feel the action of the Ascent - Cyber Heist with this Original Soundtrack.
18 tracks of awesome in both MP3s and high-definition Wav files!!
